title: Page 13 of 43 - Make Informed Decisions
cleaned_text: Is more research required here on whether there are any issues with vaccinated blood transfusions? Has testing been done? The top priority of the Red Cross is the safety of our donors, volunteers, employees and blood recipients, and we are committed to transparency with the American public during this …
